Title: The ethnic population is booming
Designer: Hunan and Hubei Population Policy Propaganda and Education Center (湖南、湖北省计划生育宣传教育中心)
Publisher: Hunansheng xinwen tupianshe (湖南省新闻图片社)
Notes: Part of an incomplete series of posters, The state of the Chinese population charts (Zhongguo renkou guoqing jiaoyu guatu 中国人口国情教育挂图), published in the 1990s.
